problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,AC与⊙O相切于点A,连接OC交⊙O于D,作DE∥AB交⊙O于E,连接AE,若∠C=40°,则∠E等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, AC is tangent to ⊙O at point A, connect OC to intersect ⊙O at D, draw DE ∥ AB to intersect ⊙O at E, connect AE, if ∠C = N_0, then ∠E is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AC与圆O相切,∴AC⊥AB,在Rt△AOC中,∠C=40°,∴∠AOC=50°,∵∠AOC与∠AED都对,∴∠E=\frac{1}{2}∠AOC=25°,故选:D．
raw_comment: 此题考查了切线的性质,以及圆周角定理,熟练掌握切线的性质是解本题的关键．
